tool_description: Validates property data quality by checking for missing values, invalid formats, and data consistency across multiple fields.

property_records.description: Array of JSON property records to validate

required_fields.description: List of fields that must be present in each record

strict_validation.description: Whether to apply strict validation rules

allow_partial_records.description: Whether to accept records with some missing non-required fields

error_messages: Empty records array: Provide at least one property record to validate.
Invalid JSON format: Property records must be valid JSON strings.
Missing required fields: Specify at least one required field for validation.
Invalid price range: price_range_min must be less than price_range_max.
Validation configuration error: Check validation parameter combinations.
usage: Provide property records as JSON strings and specify required_fields. Configure validation rules based on your data quality requirements.

valid_records.description: Array of property records that passed validation

invalid_records.description: Array of property records that failed validation

validation_summary.description: Summary of validation results and issues found

error_counts.description: Count of each type of validation error found

pass_rate.description: Percentage of records that passed validation
